channel.title: CVE Feed for aerin -- Loan Repayment Calculator and Application Form
channel.description: The latest CVEs for aerin -- Loan Repayment Calculator and Application Form

item.title: CVE-2023-50829|2024-09-13T14:56:35.022Z -- aerin -- loan%20repayment%20calculator%20and%20application%20form
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Aerin Loan Repayment Calculator and Application Form allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Loan Repayment Calculator and Application Form: from n/a through 2.9.3.

item.title: CVE-2024-31263|2024-08-02T01:46:05.075Z -- aerin -- loan%20repayment%20calculator%20and%20application%20form
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in aerin Loan Repayment Calculator and Application Form.This issue affects Loan Repayment Calculator and Application Form: from n/a through 2.9.4.

item.title: CVE-2024-31263|2024-06-04T17:36:46.859Z -- aerin -- loan%20repayment%20calculator%20and%20application%20form
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in aerin Loan Repayment Calculator and Application Form.This issue affects Loan Repayment Calculator and Application Form: from n/a through 2.9.4.
